name: Email report
author: Nicolai Guzun

sections.description: The plugin is destined for sending email notification to the users on publish a post or a page. The following parameters can be configured: 1) Send notification for post, page or for both; 2) Email from which will be sent the mail; 3) Send notification only for new or for all post/page;
sections.installation:
1. Upload email-report to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Set plugin parameters through the Email report menu in WordPress

short_description: The plugin is destined for sending email notification to the users on publish a post or a page.
